def: dealer name=dealer_play ! v4l2_tegra_encoder name=encoder fps=@APP.FPS@ br=@APP.BITRATE_KBPS@ preset=ultrafast ! recorder path=/mnt/data-ssd/@FIRST_STORED_TIME@/@TIME_STAMP@.pif pif_split=1

params.dealer_play.def: recorder mode=play path=@APP.PATH@ ! pcuda_remapper name=remapper maptype=WINDOW ignore_view_params=1 fom=@APP.FOV@ view_quat=@APP.VIEW_QUAT@ debalgo=malvar debayer=I420 sh=0 rgb_gain=@APP.RGB_GAIN@ gamma=2.2 s=@APP.SIZE@
drecorder mode=play path=@APP.PATH@ ! pcuda_remapper name=remapper maptype=WINDOW ignore_view_params=1 debalgo=linear debayer=I420 sh=10 rgb_gain=@APP.RGB_GAIN@ gamma=2.2 s=@APP.SIZE@
